results.title: Anterior spinal cord syndrome after initiation of treatment with atenolol.
results.text_hl: His neurological examination revealed bilateral @<m>DISEASE_Paralysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010243 @@@paralysis@@@ of the lower extremities.

citations.NLM: Schneider GS. Anterior spinal cord syndrome after initiation of treatment with atenolol. J Emerg Med. 2010 Jun;38(5):e49-52. PMID: 18597977
citations.BibTeX: @article{18597977, title={Anterior spinal cord syndrome after initiation of treatment with atenolol.}, author={Schneider GS}, journal={J Emerg Med}, volume={38}, number={5}, pages={e49-52}}

results.title: Paralysis that easily reverses: a case of thyrotoxic periodic paralysis.
results.text_hl: He was treated with @CHEMICAL_Potassium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011188 @@@potassium@@@ repletion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Methimazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008713 @@@methimazole@@@ with complete reversal of his @<m>DISEASE_Paralysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010243 @@@paralysis@@@ within the next day.

citations.NLM: Tachamo N, Lohani S, Nazir S, Juliano N. Paralysis that easily reverses: a case of thyrotoxic periodic paralysis. BMJ Case Rep. 2017 Jan 30;2017():. PMID: 28137907
citations.BibTeX: @article{28137907, title={Paralysis that easily reverses: a case of thyrotoxic periodic paralysis.}, author={Tachamo N and Lohani S and Nazir S and Juliano N}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={2017}}
